answers.answer: Hello,there is really no magic formula for controlling diabetes.  it comes down to:-- Monitoring blood sugars so you know whether what you are doing is working- Exercise- Low carb diet and avoidance of sugars- Weight loss / normalization if you are overweigth- Medications (oral or insulin).Some people take other supplements like cinnamon or some herbs, but these are not solutions by themselves and may only have a small benefit, in addition to the above methods.Hope this helps.
